title: My screen resolution is suddenly odd?
body: I'm not sure what resolution I normally play in, but suddenly I feel like I see a way larger amount of the map... which makes me champion a bit smaller for me to see... and it's kinda awkward and harder to see.... but when I increase my screen resolution, my whole screen goes black.

replies.body:
It sounds like your resolution settings messed up!  Alt+Enter could fix this by switching to Windowed but resetting your config could provide a more permanent fix:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
